desc: Wear Milo's provides hand made Children's clothing. From leggings and t-shirts to rompers and hoodies, all our clothing is handmade in house.

layout.text: Milo's specialises in handmade and unique clothing and accessories from Premature to Age 12. Mamas and Papas we've got you covered too! From sizes UK6 to UK24 and XXS to XXXXXL
